SUMMARY 
A Competent IT professional with over 15 years of extensive experience specializing in integration across diverse 
industries including Financial Technology, LIFE Insurance, LIFE Science, and Power utility sectors. Led R&D teams in developing 
innovative products and architecting scalable solutions in Enterprise system architecture using MuleSoft and Java/Java EE.  
Proficient in designing and implementing Integration applications, Microservice-based web applications, and Cloud-
native solutions using API-led connectivity. Skilled in leveraging Domain-Driven Design principles to analyze domain models,

define bounded contexts, and align technical implementations with business goals. Expertise includes orchestrating real-time 
messaging systems, microservices architecture, and optimizing data integration strategies.  
Proven track record of providing strategic technical direction, creating high-level design artifacts such as domain 
models and event-driven architectures, and overseeing the complete Software Development Life Cycle with a focus on
